SEARCH
Package fr.paymybuddy.controller

Class TransactionController

java.lang.Object
fr.paymybuddy.controller.TransactionController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/transaction") public class TransactionController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling financial transactions functionality.

This controller manages all transaction-related operations, including:

  • Displaying transaction history
  • Processing payments between users
  • Handling balance deposits

Version:
1.0
Author:
PayMyBuddy

    • TransactionController

      @Autowired public TransactionController(UserService userService, TransactionService transactionService, TransactionMapper transactionMapper)
      Constructor with dependency injection for TransactionController.
      Parameters:
      userService - The service handling user-related operations
      transactionService - The service handling transaction-related operations

  • Method Details

    • transactionHome

      @GetMapping public String transactionHome(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserDetailsImpl userDetails, fr.paymybuddy.dto.BalanceRequestDTO balanceRequest, fr.paymybuddy.dto.TransactionRequestDTO transactionRequest)
      Displays the transaction homepage with user's financial information.

      This endpoint renders the transaction page with:

      • User's current balance
      • List of friends for making payments
      • Transaction history
      • Forms for making payments and deposits
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model to add attributes to
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details
      balanceRequest - The DTO for handling balance operations
      transactionRequest - The DTO for handling transaction operations
      Returns:
      The name of the view template to render

    • pay

      @PostMapping("/pay") public String pay(@ModelAttribute fr.paymybuddy.dto.TransactionRequestDTO transactionRequest, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserDetailsImpl userDetails, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Processes a payment transaction between users.

      This endpoint handles the form submission for making a payment to another user. It creates a new transaction and redirects back to the transaction page with a success message.

      Parameters:
      transactionRequest - The DTO containing payment details from the form
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details
      redirectAttributes - The redirect attributes for flash messages
      Returns:
      A redirect URL to the transaction page

    • deposit

      @PostMapping("/deposit") public String deposit(@ModelAttribute fr.paymybuddy.dto.BalanceRequestDTO balanceRequest, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserDetailsImpl userDetails, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Processes a balance deposit transaction.

      This endpoint handles the form submission for adding funds to the user's account. It updates the user's balance and redirects back to the transaction page with a success message.

      Parameters:
      balanceRequest - The DTO containing deposit amount from the form
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details
      redirectAttributes - The redirect attributes for flash messages
      Returns:
      A redirect URL to the transaction page
